p.k: Degg J Force 3, Ramon Chicharron and Sékouba Bambino come from different musical cultures: hiphop, cumbia and jazz. In spite of this, these artists share the same passion, charisma and talent that are best displayed in their music.
p.d: The International Nuits d'Afrique Festival invites its audience on a global musical journey in the festive, authentic and cosmopolitan atmosphere of Montreal. Featuring over 700 artists from all over the world, the annual festival blends unique expressions of African, Caribbean and Latin American culture. Three of the festival's participants - Degg J Force 3, Ramon Chicharron and Sékouba Bambino - come from different musical cultures: hiphop, cumbia and jazz. In spite of this, these artists share the same passion, charisma and talent that are best displayed in their music. All of them have gained enormous popularity among their respected audiences.
